channel.title: Clear Chat back and interfaces
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone can point me in the correct direction in achieving this;
[IMG]http://i809.photobucket.com/albums/zz12/blackownz67/clearstuff.jpg[/img] (an example of what i want to achieve)
(Sorry if i am advertising, but this is what i need. and the only example i can find)
~I would like to have a transparent chat box and similar interfaces. ~Also be able to resize the client also is possiable ~Another thing that just came to mind. using the f1 to f12 keys as hotkeys for quick selecting things like invitory and prayer and activating SPECIAL SPECING.
(Sorry if in the wrong section)
